morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happened‚ probably in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person speaking or writing
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that happened – by people or things that are speaking or writing
